item.description:
What's the plan?

We will do approx. 3.0 mile loop (700 ft.) Blue Skyline Trail loop from the State Police to the Tower. IF IT IS RAINING WE WILL CANCEL. We will aim to be back at the cars between around 7:30 am at the latest. We also plan to hike at a relatively moderate+ pace (2 mph). It is all blue Skyline at a descent pace.  We start together, stay together, and end together as a group.

Where will we meet?

We will meet at the parking lot across from the State Police Headquarters and head up the South side of the Skyline loop and return via North Skyline. Please be on time as we will leave promptly at 6:00 am so people can get to work.

What should I bring?

Water (24 oz - 1 Liter), good hiking shoes/trail runners, bug spray

More Info:

Remember, this is a Meetup - we begin as a group and we end as a group.  These hikes are about a good workout, with good friends, supporting each other as we get into shape for the more advanced summer hiking season.

No dogs please.

And you can print out free maps here: http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/trails/print/blueHills.pdf

What should I bring?

Water, good hiking shoes/trail runners, bug spray

Random Group of Hikers Disclaimer

As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code; the organizer(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you release, hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.
item.how_to_find_us: Across the street from the State Police HQ - address above
item.name: Early Morning Hike at the Blue Hills
